UpdatesNew.Title: TMP Is Back
UpdatesNew.Description: TMP was temporarily unavailable due to falsely getting moderated by Roblox, but now it's restored.

Updates.Update: What happened?.
Updates.Description: TMP has been falsely moderated by Roblox's automation a while ago, causing players to move to an unstable version of TMP.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where cars didn't spawn.
Fixed an issue where some parts in vehicles weren't welded.
Added a vehicle spawner GUI.
Made some improvements to the city map.
Improved anti-cheat.
Bypassing certain words using escape characters is no longer possible.
Revamped the lobby.
Moved the market building (inside) to the lobby.
Fixed an issue where the sit button doesn't work.
Fixed an issue where searching maps doesn't work.
Added country/region-based license plates for vehicles.
Staff room doors are fixed.
Made an improvement to the rules GUI.
Updates.Description: Now a player has to acknowledge every rule before playing the game, so they're less likely to violate the rules.

Updates.Update: Disabled player collisions.
Most likely fixed an issue where all overhead tags are rainbow.
Added Discord Rich Presence to Bloxstrap users.
Updates.Description: Shows in which map you currently are.

Updates.Update: Improved city cars.
Updates.Description: Small fixes, including the horn.

Updates.Update: Fixed anomalies in the city map.
Staff room revamped.
80 player servers.
New features to BK/baconify Admin.
Updates.Description: Poll logs (staff only), more args (staff, coowners, supervisors, etc), and qualifiers (map, cars)

Updates.Update: Fixed audio and image library???
Rebranded the game.
Updates.Description: We're adding morphs and maps from various fandoms, so we decided to rebrand Comedy World RP Fixed to The Multiverse Project.

Updates.Update: Improved city cars and buses.
Fixed an issue where players can push the city bus.
Fixed anti-cheat.
Fixed anomalies in the city map.
Admin GUI improvements.
Fixed new year countdown board.
Added credits statues in lobby.
Fixed road signs on city map.
Updates.Description: Now correct signs (caution signs) are used on highway and tunnel curves instead of mandatory/enforcement signs to avoid confusion.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where a certain car could be heard all over the game.
Fixed car regen system.
Overall improvements.
Updates.Description: Made cars a bit faster, removed jeep super speed, etc.

Updates.Update: Fixed road markings on city map.
Fixed an issue where you can't teleport to the CW city map.
Made improvements to the anti-cheat.
Updates.Description: Now it's less likely to false ban.

Updates.Update: Overall improvements.
Updates.Description: We are continuing to improve CWRPF.

Updates.Update: Fixed mobile control for some vehicles.
Updates.Description: Now you can shift gears.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where some GUIs don't work.
Added an Audi RS6 to the city map (car spawners).
Updates.Description: Currently the best available car model in CWRPF speaking of features and quality.

Updates.Update: City map is (almost) finished.
Updates.Description: Now it has better cars, a bus, and many more things. (check it out)

Updates.Update: Added a channel bar to the chat
Updates.Description: Roblox brought back this feature. It hasn't been in CWRPF since 2022-23.

Updates.Update: Updated the phone prop GUI (same as baconifyUI but no blurs)
Implemented multiple map zones and areas.
Updates.Description: Mainly made for large maps like the city map.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the image and audio library don't work.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the padding between player headshot and morph were broken.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Transfer points and high graphics option sunsetting.
Updates.Description: No one uses these features and/or they're broken.

Updates.Update: Improved quality of some maps.
Updates.Description: This includes adding better outlines/borders for some elements and better positioning/aligning.

UpdatesNew.Title: Bugs List
UpdatesNew.Description: List of found bugs in CWRPF.

Updates.Update: Player list showing players which are not in-game sometimes.
Updates.Description: Might be difficult to fix since it's a rare bug.

Updates.Update: Changing the UI scale breaks scrolling frames sometimes.
Updates.Description: Most likely won't be fixed because it's too difficult to fix.

Updates.Update: Added 3 new maps: Sprunki background, Sprunki horror background, and City (work in progress).
Updates.Description: Keep in mind that the city map is unfinished and is mostly empty.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where search bar is unusable.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the lobby season system didn't update properly for winter.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Candy hunt event sunsetting.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Improved quality of some maps.
Updates.Description: This includes adding better outlines/borders for some elements and better positioning/aligning.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where permanently banned players get automatically unbanned.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where staff can't close the ban gui.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Candy Hunt event is here! (Until November 1) Earn 15-40 points per candy.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the glow effect is way too bright.
Updates.Description: This was caused by Roblox's new Lighting system.

Updates.Update: Some UI revamps.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Revamped stats bar. (FPS, Points, etc.)

Updates.Update: Revamped topbar. (new icons, can position to right)

Updates.Update: Improved player list (shows max. 4 badges, fixed animations, username can be copied)

Updates.Update: Added more customization to the booths. (show image, text, both, or none, image scale type, booth color)
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed GUI icons.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Implemented a feature where the lobby theme changes based on the season and event. (winter, new years, christmas, fall, default)
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where extra props from the old lobby are still available in the new lobby.

Updates.Update: Improved the admin system. (new ban GUI, Roblox Ban API)
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Added more features to the CWRPF framework. (color changer, select values)
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Added a 'reset configurations' option in settings.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Maybe other stuff i didn't include here (forgot).

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the player list sometimes doesn't work.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Added more blacklisted keywords to the image library.

Updates.Update: Revamped the maps GUI.
Updates.Description: Added category and creator info, and brand new layout.

Updates.Update: Improved icons/badges in the player list and player info.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the inventory is visible despite being closed.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the morph GUi is broken sometimes.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where booths are still claimed even if the player left.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Revamped the lobby and added booths/stands.
Updates.Description: First full lobby redesign/revamp in CWRPF.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the player list doesn't work sometimes.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the inventory/backpack hotbar has broken scaling.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: When opening the morph GUI first time, the image library will be shown instead of CW morphs.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Implemented an add/remove promocode command, owner only.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Improved the UI scale system.
Updates.Description: On Desktop/Tablet, the default UI scale is 0.9. On Mobile, it's 1.25. Customized values are only applied for the current device type (e.g. Desktop).

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where people don't earn points.
Updates.Description: Made a mistake in the points script which made it unusable.

Updates.Update: Descriptions with no description will not be shown in the changelog.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Replaced supporter+ subscription with gamepass.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the image and audio library don't work.
Updates.Description: Blacklisted IDs caused this issue.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where Amburn falsely bans people sometimes.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Added a blacklist image/audio system.
Updates.Description: Staff can now blacklist images or audios using the blacklistid command. Example: blkid 12345,123456,772727

Updates.Update: Added MDify (RichText) to the chat.
Updates.Description: Supported syntax: **Bold**, *Italic*, ***Bold&Italic***, ~~Striketrough~~, `code`, __Underline__, ==highlighting==, :emoji:

Updates.Update: Fixed the version value.
Updates.Description: It was V4.49.9 (not accurate), but now, it's V4.49.5.

Updates.Update: Added the anniversary badge and lobby props.
Updates.Description: If you join this experience during June 12-13, you'll get an anniversary badge.

Updates.Update: Updated Bacon's catalog.
Updates.Description: Added more audios to the bacon's catalog in the audio library.

Updates.Update: Fixed issues with the audio library.
Updates.Description: This includes the close button not working for exclusive audios, no results text not showing up, etc.

Updates.Update: Added an option to disable auto-morph and topbar click effect when joining the experience.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed issues with the Amburn anti-cheat.
Updates.Description: Now it works.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the anti-cheat system automatically bans you for using the fly command.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Added Amburn anti-cheat from Wonderstars.
Updates.Description: We have implemented Amburn, Wonderstars's proprietary anti-cheat engine used in 2DIRP, to prevent exploit attempts.

Updates.Update: Fixed a bug where the 'no results' text doesn't show up in the audio library.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed a bug where the close button for exclusive audios isn't working.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed a bug where the egg hunt event didn't fully end after May 1.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed a bug where the co-owner tag shows up as [Tag] or nothing.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed a bug where featured images don't show up properly.
Updates.Description: No description available.

UpdatesNew.Title: V4.49 Release Notes
UpdatesNew.Description: <s>Last update before V4.5 unless there are more bugs.</s>

Updates.Update: Added 4 new fonts.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the report feature is broken.
Updates.Description: It should work, but still partially broken.

Updates.Update: Blacklisted more images.
Updates.Description: Blacklisted several disturbing images which show up on the front page.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where report feature is broken.
Updates.Description: Untested. Let us know if it's still broken.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the RP Name placeholder (N/A) is visible.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: The Egg Hunt event has been unveiled.
Updates.Description: Available during April. Rewards can be collected until the end of May. Added a new egg: CaseOh Egg.

Updates.Update: added tomfoolery day.
Updates.Description: added tomfooleru day stuff and more and other stuff etc

Updates.Update: Improved some animations.
Updates.Description: Improved the cooldown when rapidly opening and closing the menu. (small detail)

Updates.Update: Added the bean from 2D Image Roleplay's lobby.
Updates.Description: Since Baconify Games is partnering with WonderStars, we decided to add the bean to the lobby which can be found in 2D Image Roleplay's lobby.

Updates.Update: Blacklisted 2 users and fixed the blacklist system.
Updates.Description: No description available.

Updates.Update: Fixed a few bugs.
Updates.Description: Fixed an issue where user settings don't save and where the block feature doesn't work sometimes.

UpdatesNew.Title: V4.37 Release Notes
UpdatesNew.Description: Fixed a major bug regarding the image library.

Updates.Update: Fixed an issue where the image library doesn't load.
Updates.Description: Fixed an issue where the image library, recent images, and favorite images don't load at all.

UpdatesNew.Title: V4.35 Release Notes
UpdatesNew.Description: Yet another bug fix and improvement update.

Updates.Update: V4.5 is coming in a few weeks or months.
Updates.Description: V4.5 aka the next major update will feature a new lobby, improved UIs, brand new name & look, etc.

Updates.Update: Removal of christmas props.
Updates.Description: Changed the winter lobby to the regular lobby and removed christmas props.

Updates.Update: Fixed some bugs and issue.
Updates.Description: Fixed some bugs reported by players for better experience, including broken settings, props volume not saving, etc.

Updates.Update: Added unlimited recent images slots.
Updates.Description: This might fix some issues related to recent images not saving.

Updates.Update: Improved animations.
Updates.Description: Improved notification (default) and image, audio library & morph UI (search and preferences button) animations (usually cooldown and snapiness).

UpdatesNew.Title: V4.27 Release Notes
UpdatesNew.Description: Major bug fixes for CWRPF. This is the last update before the next major update V4.5 releases. (Unless more bugs or issues are found)

Updates.Update: Fixed many bugs and issue.
Updates.Description: Fixed many bugs reported by players for better experience.

UpdatesNew.Title: V4.22 Release Notes
UpdatesNew.Description: Small improvements and features for CWRPF.

Updates.Update: Fixed some bugs.
Updates.Description: Fixed UIs etc.

Updates.Update: <s>Added a feature where the player list color is based on the headshot color.</s>
Updates.Description: Since Roblox implemented EditableImage, we decided to use it here (removed because it's still in beta and not available in-game yet). More coming soon.

Updates.Update: Added a new year countdown.
Updates.Description: Since 2023 is ending, we decided to add a new year countdown. It also has been revamped.

UpdatesNew.Title: Lack Of Updates
UpdatesNew.Description: Information regarding lack of updates, development, etc. from the creator.

Updates.Update: Why is that?
Updates.Description: I have to work on other games & commissions, IRL stuff, school, etc. and I keep procrastinating. I apologize for the lack of updates. This includes other games I'm working on.

Updates.Update: Migrated the changelog to a UI.
Updates.Description: We have decided to migrate the changelog from the lobby to a UI for easier access.

Updates.Update: Added over 10 morphs from the upcoming Go!Animate movie.
Updates.Description: Added about 13 morphs from the upcoming Go!Animate movie. This includes Ms. Mouth, Ground, Brian Schmidt, Richie Verdi, Mateo, Limmy, Grayson, etc.

Updates.Update: <s>Renamed the experience to 'Go!Animate Roleplay'.</s>
Updates.Description: Since we added non-comedy world morphs, we decided to rename this experience to 'Go!Animate Roleplay'. This brought worse reputation to the game so we decided to revert the name back.

Updates.Update: Updated the changelog system.
Updates.Description: Added image banner, descriptions, cleaner UI, etc.

Updates.Update: Added a supporter+! subscription.
Updates.Description: Roblox recently released a subscription feature so we decided to add a supporter+! subscription with more perks for $2.99/month.

Updates.Update: Fixed some bugs.
Updates.Description: This includes UI lags, UI color customization interfering with some UIs, morph system being partially broken for certain avatar sizes, props/decorations not being anchored, etc.

Updates.Update: November 4, 2023
Fixed a bug where the report feature doesn't work (V4.15).
Probably fixed a bug where the agree button is not working in the rules UI (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where entering a page value temporarily breaks the audio library (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where you can't favorite an image/audio on the 2nd time (V4.15).
Fixed a bug where the image library marketplace is unusable after switching to the favorites/recent tab (V4.13).
Fixed an issue where the animation speed doesn't apply properly for some UI elements.
Improved the phone prop UI a bit (V4.12). Fixed the UI scaling (V4.13)
Changed the lobby theme to winter.
Partially fixed UI Scale customization and Overhead UI.
October 30, 2023
Improved the update log layout (json) so adding new logs is way easier.
Partially fixed the overhead UI and map teleport system.
Fixed a bug where the hint text for the player list button didn't show up.
Added immersive ads. (not sure if they will work)
Added more supporter perks. Larger image size (up to 15) and expanded RP name limit.
Fixed an issue where players couldn't find the brick egg.
October 21, 2023
Added a chat tag color command (for rank 3 and higher).
Probably fixed a bug where the overhead UI's offset is set to way different values (i.e. it appears at the bottom) or doesn't show up.
Removed topbar icon color customization due to a bug causing it to change to random colors.
Fixed a bug where sliders/progress bars have a smaller maximum value than expected.
Added haptic feedback for topbar buttons and notifications (you can toggle it in settings).
Fixed a bug where some toggles aren't applying options properly.
Partially fixed a bug where the topbar icon color changes to a random color.
Added UI color customization support for the chat UI.
Fixed a bug where the player info breaks in some cases.
Fixed a bug where the overhead UI adder script fails to find the player's character.
October 20, 2023
You can join the legacy version of CWRP (stable) and the first version of CWRP ever. (In tunnel > more games)
October 19, 2023
Changing the UI scale breaks scrolling frames.
Fixed a bug where the overhead UI breaks when is added again while applying the RP name while sitting.
Fixed a bug where the offset value shows as 6 but is actually 0.
Fixed a bug where hiding the front image ID hides it, but it shows as 'ID:'.
Fixed a bug when the audio ID is changed using the text box, the audio name is not applied.
Fixed a bug where the favorite button doesn't work in the image library..
Fixed a bug where selecting an audio from the audio library doesn't detect if it's favorited or not.
October 16, 2023
